Title: version_patch
Description: version_patch is a stored function available with the Sys Schema.
It returns the MariaDB Server patch release version.
EffectiveSQLsRefined:
SELECT VERSION(),
 sys.version_major() AS major, 
 sys.version_minor() AS minor,
 sys.version_patch() AS patch;
EffectiveSQLs:
SELECT VERSION(),
 sys.version_major() AS major, 
 sys.version_minor() AS minor,
 sys.version_patch() AS patch;
